attributes.action: HOLD A FULL PUBLIC INQUIRY INVESTIGATING THE CORONA VIRUS COVID 19 PANDEMIC.
attributes.additional_details: The inquiry should investigate all data, medical and scientific evidence; testing, diagnosis, death certification; the Corona Virus Act and Policing of the Act; Lockdowns and tiers; Financial conflicts of interest; international influence, Party whip influence on Parliament voting - and everything else that has influenced the decision making of UK Government. A panel of 'independent' medical and legal professionals, opposition MPs, independent journalists, etc - must leave no stone unturned.
attributes.background: To investigate all matters influencing Government's decision making since 1 January 2020. Government, Parliament and their advisers have repeatedly stated that 'managing pandemics will be a regular event in the future'. Therefore the nation needs to prepare, while also holding Parliament to account.
